jsl.utilities.random.distributions
Interface LossFunctionDistributionIfc

All Superinterfaces:
CDFIfc, DistributionFunctionIfc, FirstOrderLossFunctionIfc, MeanIfc, ParametersIfc, SecondOrderLossFunctionIfc, VarianceIfc
All Known Implementing Classes:
Binomial, Gamma, Geometric, Lognormal, MTP, NegativeBinomial, Normal, Poisson, ShiftedLossFunctionDistribution
public interface LossFunctionDistributionIfc
extends DistributionFunctionIfc, FirstOrderLossFunctionIfc, SecondOrderLossFunctionIfc

Adds the first order and 2nd order loss functions to the DistributionFunctionIfc.
